content.question: The Virgin (Theotokos) and Child between Saints Theodore and George exemplifies early Byzantine pictorial conventions through the use of

choices.label: strong, direct shadows that emphasize anatomical naturalism
a frontal composition with individualized facial features drawn from life
a flattened perspective in a composition with spatial ambiguity
illusionistic architecture that is included in the background

content.answer: a flattened perspective in a composition with spatial ambiguity
